. An interesting feature to note is the Romanesque Lombard belfry, one of the most interesting in
. It is obligatory to reserve beforehand. Building with a guide service.

The centre of the village is dominated by the Cable Car system which takes you up to the Pal-Arinsal ski area within about 10 to 15 minutes, making La Massana an ideal location to go skiing from.

value: village: This village preserves the typical appearance of the traditional Pyrenean village and enters a Pal for Special Protection, passed in 1997.
